attributes.review: This app is so garbage it took me an hour for it to download and after I finish downloading my phone was starting to blow up it was burning like crazy this app on myPhone was about to destroy my phone because it took so much space in my phone and I had a lot of Space is that is garbage and also how are you gonna talk about making America great again if you’re not making America great you’re just doing it you’re polluting it and make people delusional free America it’s not great again until you’re out of office
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: When i downloaded this app so i could learn more abt my orange god i was suddenly teleported to an island! i couldn’t believe it! when i got there, people were chanting around a fire yelling TRUMP 2020! when i pinched myself to make sure it was a dream they noticed me 😔 i asked how i could get off the island but they said i couldn’t leave until our orange god died but everyone knows he won’t die so now i’m stuck here 0/10 would not recommend unless u wanna be trapped on the island with only a statue of the orange god and a whole lot of karen’s
attributes.title: Not a vibe

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to support our beloved president 🧚🏻‍♂️✨donald j trump🧚🏻‍♂️✨ but first, the app took 4 weeks to download:( then when i finally was able to get in, it CRASHED and turned my whole screen to an orange tint 🍊 now everything is stuck to orange:( oh but the story doesn’t end there. my pet fly doesn’t like 🧚🏻‍♂️✨racist homophobic rapists🧚🏻‍♂️✨ so as soon as our beloved president 🧚🏻‍♂️✨donald j trump🧚🏻‍♂️✨ opened his mouth to speak on my television, my pet fly went off the walls and ending up hanging himself:( THANKS A LOT!! this is why my vote is going to manny this year.
attributes.title: don’t download

attributes.review:
Downloaded this app for some reason and it made my phone glitch terribly. I keep seeing a cheeto popping on and off my screen. I don’t know if some other people’s phone is doing this to, but it’s happening to me. It also makes my phone slow, and when i go to exit out the app it take like 6 seconds THEN goes to the home screen. Then i keep seeing a thing glitching on and off the app saying “don’t vote for trump.”
i think i like that glitch actually. Anyways the apps not worth it.
attributes.title: Girl don’t do it,it’s not worth it.

attributes.review: I downloaded this app so I could keep up to date with our lovely Cheeto Man’s decisions for our country but I was EXTREMELY let down and DISGUSTED by the app. When I first opened the app, there was a whole collage of nude Trump pictures. I immediately went blind but I can still picture the images in my head and now I’ll be forced to regularly attend therapy due to my PTSD. The nightmares this app give me are unbelievably terrifying and i don’t want anyone else to suffer the same way I am. Please do not get this app if want to keep your eyesight and sanity.
attributes.title: Please no❤️

attributes.review: got on the app and my phone randomly stopped working. had to reset it but when I got back in some apps were strangely not working. when I contacted the creator of this app I was informed that those apps (which are now blocked) were “too violent” and “were not working in the way they thought was best”. very strange. i’ve also been told that those apps shouldn’t have just been following their guidelines and they wouldn’t have been blocked. oh well. anyways hope daddy trump can fix this bug
attributes.title: bunker boy strikes again

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to keep up with the news of our president. I was scrolling through the app when my phone completely shut down. It literally would not turn on. I had to contact Apple support to get it fixed! I would definitely recommend some bug fixes. I’m now too afraid to open the app back up because I’m worried I’ll have to contact Apple support again.

Martha was an average dog. She went argh and argh and ERGGGG... FOREIGNER💕 FOREIGNER💕. She was like papi I adore you. And I was like baby I ain’t normal. ERGGGGG FOUR IN HER💕 FOUR IN HER💕

WHO IN THE HELL PUT THE MUFFINS IN THE FREEZAH!

IF YOU SEE ME IN THE FOREST 🌳 FIGHTING WITH A GRIZZLY BEAR 🐻 HELP THE BEAR. THAT ~bleep~ GON NEED IT

All💕this🌳drama💅because🦶I 👁kissed💋nessa🧕🏿when👃we👅were🦾both👥single👤

I 👁can’t👃stop🛑singing🗣make🦷it🦵stop👣make👥it👀stop💋am👱🏾i👁real👩or👩‍🦲just👩‍🦱a🦿prop💪

attributes.title: MADE MY PHONE GLITCH

attributes.review: when i downloaded this app thinking it would be all nice and dandy, i got a ad saying “hocus pocus we put a curse on you cause your face is atrocious.” first i was insult BY (not my) THE PRESIDENT!! after that strange things started happening... first my dog would occasionally float like a soulless body, nothing abnormal, THEN i got news that my favorite app tiktok was being banned!! ALL BECAUSE I DOWNLOADED THIS APP!! witches weren’t acceptable back then, and NOW OUR (not really mine tho) PRESIDENT IS A WITCH!?! UGH THE DOUBLE STANDARD!! UNACCEPTABLE AND APPALLING!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!! (unless it’s to it the give 1 star review it DESERVES!!) #settleforbiden2020
attributes.title: I GOT HEXXED USING THE APP!!😔

attributes.review: I don’t know what’s wrong with this app. It made my phone act to weird and I know it’s not my phone because is a new one, I just bought it. When I downloaded and I try to use it it wouldn’t let me open it, so try it again later and when I finally opened it, it glitched and my phone went completely balk out. I tried to delete it wouldn’t let me so yeah! I think app doesn’t work at all and it just makes your phone act weird. :/
attributes.title: It doesn’t work at all and it makes your phone act weird.

attributes.review:
So, I downloaded this app with hopes to show my support for Donald J Trump. I opened the app and noticed an itching coming from my rear. The longer I kept the app open the worse the itching got. I kept scratching and scratching, and don’t get me started on what happened after I ate Taco Bell. There was dead skin from my rectum and feces everywhere. My parents came into my room, almost immediately dying from the toxic inhalation of my feces and urine.

In conclusion, Donald J Trump caused my parents to die and for me to be in immense pain for countless hours. Thank you
attributes.title: Anal Warts and dead parents
